name: D. Toy Machine
statement:
There is a toy machine with toys arranged in two rows of n cells each (n
is odd). Initially, n-2 toys are placed in the non-corner cells of the
top row. The bottom row is initially empty, and its leftmost, rightmost,
and central cells are blocked. There are 4 buttons to control the toy
machine: left, right, up, and down marked by the letters , , , and
correspondingly.When pressing , , , or , all the toys will be moved
simultaneously in the corresponding direction and will only stop if they
push into another toy, the wall or a blocked cell. Your goal is to move
the k-th toy into the leftmost cell of the top row. The toys are
numbered from 1 to n-2 from left to right. Given n and k, find a
solution that uses at most 1
,000
,000 button presses.To test out the toy machine, a is available that
lets you play the game in real time.
